today_in_history_posts.title: Selfish Mining Prevention
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Selfish mining involves miners colluding to mine at a lower hashrate.
- Modulating the block reward based on peak hashrate is proposed to counteract this.
- Concerns include fairness to early miners and ongoing hashrate increases.

today_in_history_posts.title: Measuring centrality of nodes in LN graph
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Kulpreet investigates measuring node centrality in the Lightning Network for better routing.
- He utilizes methods from two papers to assess centrality and network flow importance.
- Kulpreet encourages feedback on his findings detailed in a Medium post.

today_in_history_posts.title: Deflationary money is a Good Thing
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Passive and active investments are two primary strategies, involving hands-off and engaged approaches, respectively.
- The article outlines issues with passive investment, including asset misalignment and underutilization due to the principal/agent problem.
- It suggests central banks could stabilize economies by backing inflationary currency with a deflationary one like Bitcoin.
